NOTE 2 For software elements that are developed, at the lowest level of implementation executable software units are constructed (often with associated data structures, application programming interfaces, service descriptions, user documentation, test cases, or other elements), controlled, made available to authorized roles, and stored according to the CM procedures for development artifacts.
